drawnet.lib.filters
Class XMLFormalismFilter

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.filters.Filter
      drawnet.lib.filters.XMLFilter
          drawnet.lib.filters.XMLFormalismFilter

public class XMLFormalismFilter
extends XMLFilter

A filter to read/write formalisms in XML format.

read

public Formalism read(Formalism context)
Reads a XML file containing a formalism definition. The given Formalism object is appended to the result and avoids to create multiple instances of included formalisms.

setFilenameAssoc("fdl", [nomefile.fdl]) must be invoked before calling this method, otherwise a null pointer is returned.

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
a Formalism object or null
Since:
2007.11.25

read

public Formalism read()
Reads a XML file containing a formalism definition. setFilenameAssoc("fdl", [nomefile.fdl]) must be invoked before calling this method, otherwise a null pointer is returned.

Returns:
a Formalism object or null

write

public void write(Formalism f)
Writes a XML file containing a formalism definition. Sets file encoding to UTF-8. setFilenameAssoc("fdl", [nomefile.fdl]) must be invoked before calling this method, otherwise nothing is written.

Parameters:
f - the formalism to write

getPath

public java.lang.String getPath()
Gets the path for the XML Formalism input/output file. If defined, the local path is returned; otherwise the global path is returned.

Returns:
LocalPath if defined, XMLPath otherwise
